basicInfo.notes: Founded in 1996 by Dallas Bethune, Josh Jones, Michael Rodriguez, and Sage Weil - undergraduate students at Harvey Mudd College. Employee-owned company. Hosts 1M+ domains, supports 400K+ customers. 285 employees across 6 continents. Co-CEOs are original founders (Kashuba and Rodriguez). HQ in Brea, California. Known for privacy advocacy and open-source support.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: Only applies to shared hosting with credit card payment; DreamPress has 30-day guarantee; Domain registrations non-refundable; SSL certificates non-refundable; Add-on services non-refundable; Updated to 30 days as of July 2025

policiesOverages.storageOveragePolicy: Must upgrade plan or purchase additional storage
policiesOverages.accountSuspensionPolicy: AUP violations result in suspension or termination; content illegal in USA prohibited
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Illegal content; CSAM; copyright violations; TGP/adult galleries on shared hosting
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Email only free for 3 months on Shared Starter (then $1.67/mo per mailbox); PHP Extended Support costs $5/mo for PHP 8.0 and older; DreamShield security is paid extra; Hack recovery is paid extra; Money-back reduced from 97 to 30 days (July 2025); No cPanel (custom panel only)

business.affiliateCommissionAmount: Up to $300 per referral; 97-day holding period; monthly bank transfer payout; no earning limits; top earners made $20K+ last year

editorial.knownIssues: No cPanel (custom panel takes adjustment); Email not included on Shared Starter (only free 3 months); PHP Extended Support costs $5/mo extra; DreamShield security and hack recovery are paid extras; Money-back guarantee reduced from 97 to 30 days (July 2025); Phone support is callback only (not direct dial); Automatic backups exist but not guaranteed accessible; Only 3 data center locations
editorial.bestFor: Privacy-conscious users (employee-owned, privacy advocacy); WordPress users (DreamPress managed hosting); Users wanting long money-back period; Developers (SSH, Git, multiple languages); Users wanting 100% uptime guarantee; Open-source advocates; US-based websites (2 US + 1 EU data center)
editorial.avoidIf: Need cPanel; Need included email on basic plan; Need more global data center options; Prefer direct phone support; Need enterprise compliance (no SOC2/HIPAA); Budget-conscious long-term (VPS renewal 150% markup)
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: 97-day money-back (industry-leading, but reduced to 30 in July 2025); 100% uptime guarantee vs 99.9% competitors; Employee-owned vs private equity (Newfold) competitors; Custom panel vs cPanel (Namecheap/HostGator have cPanel); Email not included on starter (unlike Hostinger/Namecheap); Only 3 data centers vs 10+ at SiteGround/Hostinger; $99 migration vs $149.99 HostGator; DreamPress managed WP well-regarded; Higher Trustpilot (4.7) than HostGator (4.5)

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Employee-owned privacy advocate with 100% uptime guarantee and full developer tools
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Privacy-conscious developer or WordPress enthusiast wanting ethical hosting

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: DreamHost is excellent for privacy-conscious users and developers, with 100% uptime guarantee and ethical ownership, but has a custom panel instead of cPanel.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: DreamHost is employee-owned (New Dream Network, LLC), founded by college students in 1996. Known for privacy advocacy.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: DreamHost shared hosting starts at $2.95/month (promo) and renews at $7.99/month. First year costs approximately $35.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Moderately. DreamHost has good support and documentation, but the custom control panel takes adjustment from cPanel users.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: Not on the basic Shared Starter plan (only free for 3 months). Higher plans include email.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, DreamHost offers DreamPress managed WordPress hosting with staging, caching, and excellent performance.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: DreamHost guarantees 100% uptime, the highest in the industry, with SLA credits for any downtime.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, with a 97-day money-back guarantee (reduced to 30 days as of July 2025). Only applies to shared hosting with credit card.
